title: Enhance RenderTask to Support Page Ranges
description: The software should be enhanced to support page ranges in the RenderTask. When a page range is specified, it should be parsed and processed, and the output should include the specified pages, separated by a page splitter, similar to the behavior in runAndRenderTask. It is important to note that only one page should be included in case a specific page number is set.
OB: The observed behavior is not provided in the report. It is essential to specify the current behavior or issue you are facing.
EB: The expected behavior is not provided in the report. It should be explicitly stated how page ranges should be handled in both PDF and HTML formats.
SR:
To enhance RenderTask to support page ranges:
1. For PDF format, log a message saying that page ranges are not supported if specified and still generate the complete report. If no range is set, check if a specific page number is set.
2. For HTML format, support page ranges in the form of '1,2,510' and 'All'. If no range is set, check if a specific page number is set.
